description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任西藏自治区革命委员会副主任，西藏自治区人民政府第一副主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as the vice-chairman of the Tibet Autonomous Region Revolutionary Committee and the first vice-chairman of the Tibet Autonomous Region People's Government.

nodes.id: 西藏自治区革命委员会

zh-cn: 西藏自治区革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间西藏自治区的最高权力机构。
description.en: The highest organ of power in the Tibet Autonomous Region during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国西藏自治区的省级人民政府。
description.en: The provincial-level people's government of the Tibet Autonomous Region in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 西藏自治区革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 郭锡兰曾担任西藏自治区革命委员会副主任。
description.en: Guo Xilan served as the Vice Chairman of the Tibet Autonomous Region Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 郭锡兰曾担任西藏自治区人民政府第一副主席。
description.en: Guo Xilan served as the First Vice Chairman of the People's Government of the Tibet Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，郭锡兰是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to category information, Guo Xilan was a member of the Communist Party of China.
